home.subTitle: Together we empower developers building the ecosystem of Starcoin.

create.title: Create
create.subTitle: Request funds for your Starcoin project.

form.title: What is the name of your project?
form.desc: What do you aim to achieve? How will it benefit the Starcoin ecosystem?
form.amount: The amount of STC apply for
form.project: Where can voters learn about the details of your project? eg: website, blog post, document
form.contact: How can folks contact you? eg: Twitter, Discord, Telegram link
form.grantee: Who will be the recipients of this grant?

faq.title: FAQ
message: Our goal is to create long-term incentives for open-source developers working on Starcoin ecosystem, especially public goods R&D, which are essential to Starcoin’s success.

The community can vote Approve or Oppose for a grant. If a grant get more than 4 millions votes and the opposed vote less than the 30% of total votes, it can be funded by the foundation of Starcoin. Furthermore, the foundation of Starcoin also could fund a grant directly with small amount.

message.starmaskNotInstalled: The Starmask plug-in is not detected, please download and install and try again
message.less: The current balance is too low, please recharge and vote
message.unsupportNode: Unsupported network, please specify the main network in the Starmask plug-in
